revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: transpose scribal punctuation to after modern punctuation throughout; add scribal asper in r.5; remove extra space at beginning of v.46; add *dicolon**middot* before the filler(extension) in v.50; fix accent on τί in v.51. META: remove volume number from 3787; add generic ‘descr.’ to 8932 and 18263; digital image link is (https://luna.manchester.ac.uk/luna/servlet/detail/ManchesterDev~93~3~23087~100278:Isaiah-21-22?sort=reference_number%2Cimage_sequence_number%2Cimage_title%2Cimage_number&qvq=w4s:/what%2FBible.%2BOld%2BTestament;sort:reference_number%2Cimage_sequence_number%2Cimage_title%2Cimage_number;lc:ManchesterDev~93~3&mi=13&trs=18)

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: transpose scribal punctuation to after modern punctuation throughout; add scribal asper in r.5; remove extra space at beginning of v.46; add *dicolon**middot* before the filler(extension) in v.50; fix accent on τί in v.51. META: remove volume number from 3787; add generic ‘descr.’ to 8932 and 18263; digital image link is (https://luna.manchester.ac.uk/luna/servlet/detail/ManchesterDev~93~3~23087~100278:Isaiah-21-22?sort=reference_number%2Cimage_sequence_number%2Cimage_title%2Cimage_number&qvq=w4s:/what%2FBible.%2BOld%2BTestament;sort:reference_number%2Cimage_sequence_number%2Cimage_title%2Cimage_number;lc:ManchesterDev~93~3&mi=13&trs=18)

Submit - Encoded Greek text from P.Ryl.3.459. Between lin49 and lin50 the print has a stroke, followed by a dot. Is that a kind of paragraphos, is it a supralinear stroke? Image plate IV gives no solution (don't see any stroke)
